Name: Avenue San Martin
Ingredients: 45 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass .
Review: Bittersweet and tangy. A cocktail to enjoy as an ap√©ritif with nibbles.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2016 at Bar Hommage, Stockholm, Sweden. This cocktail takes its name from a street in Lima, Peru where the creators of this cocktail once ended up at a bar called Ayahuasca.
